title: Basic rectangle
With stroke
source:
const rect = new Rectangle({
    width: 100,
    height: 50,
    color: '#e94560',
    strokeColor: '#ffffff',
    strokeWidth: 2
})

title: Positioned rectangle
source:
const rect = new Rectangle({
    x: 50,
    y: 30,
    width: 100,
    height: 50,
    color: '#0f3460'
})

title: Dimensions
source:
const rect = new Rectangle({
    width: 100,
    height: 50,
    color: '#e94560'
})
logger.log('width:', rect.width)
logger.log('height:', rect.height)

rect.width = 200
rect.height = 100
logger.log('after resize:', rect.width, 'x', rect.height)

title: Colors
source:
const rect = new Rectangle({
    color: '#e94560',
    strokeColor: '#ffffff',
    strokeWidth: 2
})
logger.log('color:', rect.color)
logger.log('strokeColor:', rect.strokeColor)
logger.log('strokeWidth:', rect.strokeWidth)

title: Default anchor (0.5, 0.5)
Top-left anchor (0, 0)
source:
const rect = new Rectangle({
    width: 100,
    height: 50,
    anchorX: 0,
    anchorY: 0
})
const bounds = rect.getBounds()
logger.log('minX:', bounds.minX)
logger.log('minY:', bounds.minY)
logger.log('maxX:', bounds.maxX)
logger.log('maxY:', bounds.maxY)

title: Transform example
source:
const rect = new Rectangle({
    x: 100,
    y: 100,
    width: 50,
    height: 50,
    color: '#533483',
    rotation: Math.PI / 4,
    scaleX: 2,
    scaleY: 1.5,
    anchorX: 0.5,
    anchorY: 0.5
})

title: Method chaining
source:
const rect = new Rectangle({width: 50, height: 50, color: '#e94560'})
rect.setPosition(100, 100)
    .setRotation(Math.PI / 4)
    .setScale(2)
    .setOpacity(0.8)
logger.log('x:', rect.x, 'y:', rect.y)
logger.log('rotation:', rect.rotation)
logger.log('scale:', rect.scaleX, rect.scaleY)
logger.log('opacity:', rect.opacity)
